definition: painted ornament/livery (on airline or company vehicle)
to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: It would cost thousands of dollars have the guitars professionally refinished .
sentences.chinese: 如果要找專業的塗裝師重做漆面將要花很多錢。

sentences.english: This text introduced features, principle, technological method of airless spraying and equipment of painting.
sentences.chinese: 無氣噴塗是應用最廣泛的塗裝方法之一。

sentences.english: The main water-used equipments and water-saving technologies thereof in automobile coatings are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了汽車塗裝的主要用水設備及其節水技術。

sentences.english: In addition there are a number of requirements that apply to liveries for all cars and teams.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還有許多針對賽車和車隊塗裝的要求。

sentences.english: Particularly suitable for plastic coatings , automotive refinish coatings , car-accessories coatings , art-craft coatings , etc.
sentences.chinese: 用於高級塑料塗裝，汽車及配件塗裝和工藝品塗裝等。

sentences.english: Particularly suitable for plastic coatings , automotive refinish coatings , car-accessories coatings , art-craft coatings , etc.
sentences.chinese: 用於高級塑料塗裝，汽車及配件塗裝和工藝品塗裝等。

sentences.english: Particularly suitable for plastic coatings , automotive refinish coatings , car-accessories coatings , art-craft coatings , etc.
sentences.chinese: 用於高級塑料塗裝，汽車及配件塗裝和工藝品塗裝等。

sentences.english: Don’t use wood finishes, glues, or spot removers.
sentences.chinese: 不要用木材塗裝，膠水或光電消除劑。

sentences.english: What'sthe paint spray on the propeller?
sentences.chinese: 螺旋槳塗裝時要注意些什麼？

sentences.english: French polishing is made to order for instrument collectors, dealers and guitarists .
sentences.chinese: 蟲膠漆塗裝適合樂器收藏者，經銷商和吉他手掌握。

sentences.english: A thick coating stain sealer, and make it dry overnight.
sentences.chinese: 塗裝一層厚的污漬封閉底漆，並使它隔夜晾乾。

sentences.english: Each roller coating can complete the application of more than three planes.
sentences.chinese: 每次滾塗即可完成三個以上平面的塗裝。

sentences.english: Wait, , did they just say camo paint benefits smaller tanks more???
sentences.chinese: 等等，你們是有說過塗裝在小坦克上收益更多嘛？

sentences.english: A section of non-metallic tubing used to deliver compressed air for paint or powder application.
sentences.chinese: 爲油漆或粉末塗裝釋放壓縮空氣的非金屬管部分。

sentences.english: Specialized construction teams offer the overall after- sale service to users.
sentences.chinese: 專業的塗裝施工隊伍爲用戶提供全面的售後服務。

sentences.english: Coating for metal, wood and plastic.
sentences.chinese: 金屬，木器，塑膠等之塗裝。

definition: look/external appearance/design/overall brand look or logo that can be patented
to glue to/to paste onto/to stick on/also written 粘貼|粘贴[zhan1 tie1]
